name: Keyboard Script File
summary: Learn about .KBS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since KBS files are stored in plain text, you can open them with any text editor.
NOTE: PC Dirck Keyboard Script has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

description: Script used by Keyboard Script, a keystroke automation program; saved in a plain text format and contains instructions for keystrokes; used for saving repetitive key sequences; functions similarly to a macro that is triggered by a key combination.
